mapper.select:
call up_RmsQryAll( #{scondtext, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{iStart, mode=IN, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{iUserNum, mode=IN, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{iEnd, mode=IN, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{itype, mode=IN, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{iIsSelfExec, mode=IN, jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{iCount, mode=OUT, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{RCQry, mode=OUT, jdbcType=CURSOR, resultMap=infoProjectMap} )
select OWNERNAME,OWNERCERTNUM,OWNERNAME_PEIOU,OWNERCERTNUM_PEIOU FROM RWRECOWNER where OWNERCERTNUM = #{idNum} and 1>=rownum
